-8: You get an emblem with :Whenever you cast a spell, exile target permanent.:
Whenever a creature you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {X}. If you do, you gain X life.
Whenever an artifact is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, you may draw a card.
Enchant permanent
When Volition Reins enters the battlefield, if enchanted permanent is tapped, untap it.
You control enchanted permanent.
When Vulshok Heartstoker enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{1}{R}, Sacrifice Vulshok Replica: Vulshok Replica deals 3 damage to target player.
Defender

rule.reminder: It can block creatures with flying.

rulelist.rule: {G}: Wall of Tanglecord gains reach until end of turn.
You gain 5 life.
Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.

rule.reminder: Lethal damage and effects that say :destroy: don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.

rulelist.rule: Target creature is indestructible this turn.
Deathtouch, lifelink

When Wurmcoil Engine is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with deathtouch and a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with lifelink onto the battlefield.
